scripts.dev:ios:prod: EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://haps.app npm run prebuild && expo run:ios
scripts.dev:android:prod: EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://haps.app npm run prebuild && expo run:android
scripts.release:ios: EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://haps.app npm run prebuild && npx expo run:ios --device --configuration Release
scripts.release:android: EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://haps.app npm run prebuild && npx expo run:android --device --configuration Release
scripts.build:setup: echo 'Please run this command directly in your terminal:' && echo 'eas credentials:configure-build -p ios --profile production' && echo '' && echo 'Or use:' && echo 'eas credentials -p ios'
